Package vista2D

Class AbstractAnimatedDoor2D

java.lang.Object
vista2D.AbstractAnimatedDoor2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGraphicRenderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnimatedDoor2D, AnimatedEnteringDoor2D
public abstract class AbstractAnimatedDoor2D extends Object implements IGraphicRenderer
Author:
Guillermo Lazzurri Clase que representa graficamente una puerta de entrada / salida de la piramide.
